projects.name: omendb
projects.description: Embedded vector database for Python. ACORN-1 filtered search, RaBitQ quantization, hybrid search. LangChain and LlamaIndex integrations

projects.name: seerdb
projects.description: LSM storage engine with ALEX learned indexes and WiscKey key-value separation. 2.5x faster writes, 2x faster reads, and 5x lower write amplification vs RocksDB

projects.name: hhg
projects.description: Hybrid code search combining semantic embeddings with BM25 keyword matching. Tree-sitter extraction, local indexing, 22 languages

projects.name: jb
projects.description: Background job manager for long-running tasks. Parallel execution, session persistence, real-time monitoring. Used for AI agent workflows

projects.name: pacabot
projects.description: AI trading bot using LangGraph multi-agent system. Aggregates 13 data sources including market data, SEC filings, news, and social sentiment

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Reduced test suite runtime by 90% (45 min to 5 min) by reducing syscall overhead in filesystem operations
Built Python backend API and gRPC integrations for distributed services
Developed regression testing infrastructure in Go and Python

awards.title: 2nd Place & Ingenico Winner, Money 20/20 Las Vegas 2016
awards.description: Developed cross-terminal payment application with REST API for business partnerships. Built with Go and PostgreSQL, deployed on CoreOS
